name: moving-bubbles
description: This visualization tracks a sample of couples in the 1970's to show how long they transition through relationship stages. It is wholly based on Nathan Yau's [The Stages of Relationships, Distributed](https://flowingdata.com/2019/03/26/relationship-stages/) and his companion tutorial [How to Make a Moving Bubble Chart, Based on a Dataset](https://flowingdata.com/2019/04/22/moving-bubbles-tutorial-v2/) (*note: you'll need a [FlowingData membership](https://flowingdata.com/membership/) to view this tutorial.*)
